mapper.select: SELECT TX_ID AS txId, ERROR_DATETIME AS errorDatetime, CALLEE_CHASU AS calleeChasu, CUSTOMER_WAIT_ENABLE AS customerWaitEnable, CORP_CODE AS corpCode, CALLEE_REQ_GUBUN AS calleeReqGubun, BRANCH_CODE AS branchCode, BRANCH_NAME AS branchName, CORNER_CODE AS cornerCode, CORNER_NAME AS cornerName, PLACE_GUBUN AS placeGubun, REGION_GUBUN AS regionGubun, TERMINAL_NO AS terminalNo, CALLEE_GUBUN AS calleeGubun, CALLEE_REQ_DATETIME AS calleeReqDatetime, ARRIVAL_PLAN_DATETIME AS arrivalPlanDatetime, ARRIVAL_DATETIME AS arrivalDatetime, HANDLE_METHOD AS handleMethod, CALLEE_ELAPSED_TIME AS calleeElapsedTime, CALLEE_ELAPSED_SECONDS AS calleeElapsedSeconds, ARRIVAL_ELAPSED_TIME AS arrivalElapsedTime, ARRIVAL_ELAPSED_SECONDS AS arrivalElapsedSeconds, ARRIVAL_PLAN_REPORT_DATETIME AS arrivalPlanReportDatetime, ERROR_CONTENT AS errorContent, MODEL_NAME AS modelName FROM ATMS_SLA_80

SELECT TX_ID AS txId, ERROR_DATETIME AS errorDatetime, CALLEE_CHASU AS calleeChasu, CUSTOMER_WAIT_ENABLE AS customerWaitEnable, CORP_CODE AS corpCode, CALLEE_REQ_GUBUN AS calleeReqGubun, BRANCH_CODE AS branchCode, BRANCH_NAME AS branchName, CORNER_CODE AS cornerCode, CORNER_NAME AS cornerName, PLACE_GUBUN AS placeGubun, REGION_GUBUN AS regionGubun, TERMINAL_NO AS terminalNo, CALLEE_GUBUN AS calleeGubun, CALLEE_REQ_DATETIME AS calleeReqDatetime, ARRIVAL_PLAN_DATETIME AS arrivalPlanDatetime, ARRIVAL_DATETIME AS arrivalDatetime, HANDLE_METHOD AS handleMethod, CALLEE_ELAPSED_TIME AS calleeElapsedTime, CALLEE_ELAPSED_SECONDS AS calleeElapsedSeconds, ARRIVAL_ELAPSED_TIME AS arrivalElapsedTime, ARRIVAL_ELAPSED_SECONDS AS arrivalElapsedSeconds, ARRIVAL_PLAN_REPORT_DATETIME AS arrivalPlanReportDatetime, ERROR_CONTENT AS errorContent, MODEL_NAME AS modelName FROM ATMS_SLA_80 WHERE TX_ID = #{txId}, ERROR_DATETIME = #{errorDatetime}, CALLEE_CHASU = #{calleeChasu}
mapper.update: DELETE FROM ATMS_SLA_80 WHERE TX_ID = #{txId}, ERROR_DATETIME = #{errorDatetime}, CALLEE_CHASU = #{calleeChasu}

UPDATE ATMS_SLA_80 SET CUSTOMER_WAIT_ENABLE = #{customerWaitEnable}, CORP_CODE = #{corpCode}, CALLEE_REQ_GUBUN = #{calleeReqGubun}, BRANCH_CODE = #{branchCode}, BRANCH_NAME = #{branchName}, CORNER_CODE = #{cornerCode}, CORNER_NAME = #{cornerName}, PLACE_GUBUN = #{placeGubun}, REGION_GUBUN = #{regionGubun}, TERMINAL_NO = #{terminalNo}, CALLEE_GUBUN = #{calleeGubun}, CALLEE_REQ_DATETIME = #{calleeReqDatetime}, ARRIVAL_PLAN_DATETIME = #{arrivalPlanDatetime}, ARRIVAL_DATETIME = #{arrivalDatetime}, HANDLE_METHOD = #{handleMethod}, CALLEE_ELAPSED_TIME = #{calleeElapsedTime}, CALLEE_ELAPSED_SECONDS = #{calleeElapsedSeconds}, ARRIVAL_ELAPSED_TIME = #{arrivalElapsedTime}, ARRIVAL_ELAPSED_SECONDS = #{arrivalElapsedSeconds}, ARRIVAL_PLAN_REPORT_DATETIME = #{arrivalPlanReportDatetime}, ERROR_CONTENT = #{errorContent}, MODEL_NAME = #{modelName} WHERE TX_ID = #{txId}, ERROR_DATETIME = #{errorDatetime}, CALLEE_CHASU = #{calleeChasu}

INSERT INTO ATMS_SLA_80 ( TX_ID, ERROR_DATETIME, CALLEE_CHASU, CUSTOMER_WAIT_ENABLE, CORP_CODE, CALLEE_REQ_GUBUN, BRANCH_CODE, BRANCH_NAME, CORNER_CODE, CORNER_NAME, PLACE_GUBUN, REGION_GUBUN, TERMINAL_NO, CALLEE_GUBUN, CALLEE_REQ_DATETIME, ARRIVAL_PLAN_DATETIME, ARRIVAL_DATETIME, HANDLE_METHOD, CALLEE_ELAPSED_TIME, CALLEE_ELAPSED_SECONDS, ARRIVAL_ELAPSED_TIME, ARRIVAL_ELAPSED_SECONDS, ARRIVAL_PLAN_REPORT_DATETIME, ERROR_CONTENT, MODEL_NAME ) VALUES ( #{txId}, #{errorDatetime}, #{calleeChasu}, #{customerWaitEnable}, #{corpCode}, #{calleeReqGubun}, #{branchCode}, #{branchName}, #{cornerCode}, #{cornerName}, #{placeGubun}, #{regionGubun}, #{terminalNo}, #{calleeGubun}, #{calleeReqDatetime}, #{arrivalPlanDatetime}, #{arrivalDatetime}, #{handleMethod}, #{calleeElapsedTime}, #{calleeElapsedSeconds}, #{arrivalElapsedTime}, #{arrivalElapsedSeconds}, #{arrivalPlanReportDatetime}, #{errorContent}, #{modelName} )
